unit.creator: Philodemus || Ranocchia, Graziano et Vassallo, Christian
unit.title: De rhetorica || Col. 41 PHerc. 1004 || Diplomatic Apparatus

dsl.content: 1 ]ϲω[ +1 sub lineam vert., (κ, υ), (ν, κ) 2 ]υθεϲπ[ +1 3 ]ε̣ωι[ +1 (κ, χ, α, λ, ϲ) 4 ]ν[ +1 (π, ν), (ε, ϲ), (κ, π, ν, η), sin. sup. ramus 5 ][ +1 (φ, ρ, β), dext. sup. vert., (ϲ, ε), inf. vert. 9 [ +1 (δ, ζ) 10 [ +1 (χ, υ) 11 ρ[ +1 13 ][ +1 inf. vert. 14 ]τ[ +1 (ρ, β) 15 ][ +1 (ρ, φ, ψ), (ο, θ, β) 16 ][ +1 dext. sup. ramus, sin. sup. ramus, sup. vert.
